name: murmurous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a sound or a voice) soft and quiet: They sat in the shade around the murmurous fountains in the courtyards. He went on speaking in a soft and murmurous voice.
More examplesFewer examplesThe shady gardens were murmurous with bees.They waited for him in the murmurous silence of the huge room.We could hear a murmurous chanting in the distance.We ate our dinner on a terrace overlooking the gentle, murmurous sea.The room was filled with murmurous voices.
